name: BRUISES
description:
Bruises is a short point & click adventure about keeping a relationship alive. For three weeks now, you weren't able to skate. Your board is still up in the 'home', a self-made hideout in an abandoned industry building you and your friends use to skate. For three weeks now, it was just you and your thoughts. Barrages of the same thoughts over and over again. You can't bear it.

You HAVE TO skate.

You have to GO GET IT!

Controls
Left Mouse: Interact
Right Mouse: Look
